How to Download Your Unofficial Transcript (Student View)

  1. Log in to DegreeWorks.
  2. Make sure you are on the “Worksheets” tab.
  3. Click the print icon “Create PDF” to view your transcript.
  4. Once the PDF opens in a new tab or window, open the browser’s Print menu (Ctrl+P or Cmd+P).
  5. Set the printer destination to “Save as PDF.”
  6. Click Save to download your unofficial transcript.

Note: If you're a double major, you may need to download transcripts for each major individually.

🔑 How to Generate a Canvas Token

  1. 🔗 Go to uncg.instructure.com and log in
  2. 👤 Click Account → Settings
  3. ⚙️ Scroll to Approved Integrations
  4. ➕ Click + New Access Token
  5. ✏️ Fill in:
    • Purpose: EduPlan Integration
    • Expiration Date: last day of class (e.g. 2025-05-02)
  6. 📋 Click Generate Token
  7. 📥 Paste the token below
